choiceLibraries.x-prompt: Which @paddls dependencies would you like to install?

ngxRepositoryVersion.x-prompt: Which version of ngx-repository, ngx-firstore-repository and ngx-http-repository ? (if empty, the latest version compatible will be installed by default)

ngxCommonVersion.x-prompt: Which version of ngx-common-version ? (if empty, the latest version compatible will be installed by default)

ngxSerializerVersion.x-prompt: Which version of ngx-serializer ? (if empty, the latest version compatible will be installed by default)

rxjsCommonVersion.x-prompt: Which version of rxjs-common ? (if empty, the latest version compatible will be installed by default)

tsSerializerVersion.x-prompt: Which version of ts-serializer ? (if empty, the latest version compatible will be installed by default)
